sentences.english: The opera was directed by the well-known Chinese director, Zhang Yimou.
sentences.chinese: 歌劇由中國著名導演張藝謀執導。

sentences.english: "The Curse of the Golden Flower" directed by Zhang Yimou is attractive in sound and picture.
sentences.chinese: 張藝謀的《滿城盡帶黃金甲》音畫都十分吸引人。

sentences.english: People have been anxiously awaiting another martial arts blockbuster from Zhang Yimou.
sentences.chinese: 人們一直在急切地等待着張藝謀的下一部武打大片。

sentences.english: No wonder people are wondering whether Zhang Yimou is too spent after the Olympic Ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 難怪，大家懷疑張藝謀是否在奧運後已經江郎才盡。

sentences.english: Red Sorghum (a). Directed by Zhang Yimou. China, 1987.
Zhang makes the chrysanthemum the film's visual leitmotif.
sentences.chinese: 於是張藝謀把菊花作爲影片的視覺主題。

sentences.english: Otherwise the first triumph belonged to the evening's auteur Zhang Yimou.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，首場勝利屬於開幕式的導演張藝謀。

sentences.english: Zhang Yimou was one of the cameramen while Zhang Junzhao acted as the director.
sentences.chinese: 張藝謀是攝影師之一，張軍釗做導演。

sentences.english: A new film directed by Mr Zhang Yimou will be released next month.
sentences.chinese: 張藝謀導演的一部新影片將於下月發行。

sentences.english: In 1990 Zhang Yimou made Ju Dou with Japanese funding.
sentences.chinese: 1990年張藝謀在日本人的贊助下製作了《菊豆》。
